hero.tagline: Your personal AI companion for emotional wellness and self-reflection using VOICE journaling

features.title: How SOULo Works
features.subtitle: Our innovative approach combines voice journaling with AI technology to provide you with meaningful insights about yourself.

feature1.title: Voice Journaling
feature1.description: Record your thoughts with voice and let SOULo transcribe and analyze them automatically.

feature2.title: AI Analysis
feature2.description: Gain insights into your patterns and emotions through advanced AI analysis.

feature3.title: Emotional Tracking
feature3.description: Visualize your emotional journey over time with interactive charts.

feature4.title: AI Assistant
feature4.description: Chat with your journal and get personalized insights from your past entries.
